name: Space Turbo 2
description:
Space Turbo 2 - Continuation of a dynamic arcade game in which you have to fly a futuristic space plane through an endless tunnel and avoid various traps. Earn points and unlock new ships of which there are even more! Avoid a variety of traps and score as many points as possible and set your incredible record!

You will slowly accelerate through the tunnel, picking up speed until you lose. You can then try to beat your previous score again. You can choose from three game difficulties and choose the spaceship of your choice that suits you. There are many traps and obstacles waiting for you, so go around them all!

Game Features:
- Excellent graphics
- Various obstacles
- Various spaceships
